title: Lag in league client
body: So i was about to enter the game but suddenly it crashed in the loading screen and it started repairing itself, and i got 5 games leaverbuster for that. My pc is so bad i get low priority queue because it lags so much in league client and it just freezes and sometimes i can't ban or pick a champion (it doesn't lag in game.) Does anybody know how to reduce lag in client?

replies.body: Sorry to hear about the crashing issues that caused this.  :(  It might be a good idea to make a custom game just to make sure that your game was repaired properly.  The freezing in champion select just sounds like frustrating double whammy of issues, but the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide might be able to help here.  Try enabling [low spec mode](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png) mode as well to help reduce pc stress.  Make sure to test these in custom games first!
